bug.author: mataney
bug.summary: Calling torchtext.data.Dataset slow after updating to 0.2.0
bug.description: After updating to tag 0.2.0 calling torchtext.data.Dataset is a lot slower (doesn't seem to stop for CNNDM dataset) when using dynamic_dict as in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/OpenNMT/OpenNMT-py/blob/45d92297e40775d46c66df60c69060e63bfa4417/onmt/IO.py#L364-L378>here</denchmark-link> (passing filter as well). After downgrading back to 0.1.1 works well again. Couldn't find any reason why this might happen. Any advice?

comments.comment: I will close this issue since we are now on 0.4.0. Feel free to reopen it if you still experience the slowdown.
